comment: Thanks for your positive feedback, Saraidh! All of us at Allina Health strive to provide the highest quality of care possible, and we thank you for choosing us as your healthcare partner!
amr:
# ::snt Thanks for your positive feedback, Saraidh! All of us at Allina Health strive to provide the highest quality of care possible, and we thank you for choosing us as your healthcare partner!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (t / thank-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Saraidh"))
                  :ARG2 (f / feedback
                        :mod (p2 / positive)
                        :poss p))
            :ARG2 p)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s2 / strive-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we
                        :mod (a2 / all)
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c / company
                                    :name n
                                    :op1 "Allina"
                                    :op2 "Health"))))
            :ARG1 (p3 / provide-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (c2 / care-03
                        :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (h3 / high-02
                                    :ARG1 (q / quality)
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / most)
                                    :ARG5 (p4 / possible-01)))))
            :op2 (t2 / thank-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (c3 / choose-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 w
                        :ARG4 (p5 / partner
                              :mod (h4 / healthcare)
                              :poss p)))))

comment: Thank you for sharing this positive feedback, Jim!
amr:

comment: I got my shot this afternoon. Very smooth process even though I was a bit early. Everybody was delighted to be there. Thank you, Allina staff and volunteers!
amr:
# ::snt I got my shot this afternoon. Very smooth process even though I was a bit early. Everybody was delighted to be there. Thank you, Allina staff and volunteers!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / get-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / shoot-02
                  :ARG0 ii)
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (a / afternoon)
                  :mod (t / today)))
      :snt2 (p / process-02
            :ARG1-of (s2 / smooth-04
                  :degree (v / very))
            :concession (e / early
                  :domain (ii2 / i)
                  :degree (b / bit)))
      :snt3 (d2 / delight-01
            :ARG0 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 (e2 / everybody)
                  :ARG2 (t2 / there))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (y / you)
                  :op2 (p2 / person
                        :ARG2-of (s3 / staff-01
                              :ARG1 (f / facility
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Allina"))))
                  :op3 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (v2 / volunteer-01)))))
